alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 2:04PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central La Paz County through 245 PM MST... At 203 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Brenda, or 45 miles southeast of Parker, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central La Paz County. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 33 and 50. US Highway 60 between mile markers 34 and 41, and between mile markers 48 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
